@notice Emitted when contact is deleted
 @param sender The address who deleted contact

@notice Emitted when contact is modified
 @param sender The address who modified contact

@notice Emitted when contact is deleted
 @param sender The address who deleted contact

@notice Emitted when contact is modified
 @param sender The address who modified contact

params.account: Address of user deleting the contact
params.deletedContactId: The Id of contact to be deleted isAddressOwner modifier must be provided

params.account: Address of the user you want to retrieve contact
params.contactId: The id of contact you want to retrieve

params.account: Address of user modifying the contact
params.modifiedContactId: The id of contact to be modified
params.modifiedContactInfo: String containing modified contact information isAddressOwner modifier must be provided

params.account: Address of user storing the contact
params.contactInfo: String containing contact information isAddressOwner modifier must be provided

deleteContact(address,uint8).notice: Delete contact, can only be owner of account addres

getContact(address,uint8).notice: Retrieve data of a specific contact information

modifyContact(address,uint8,string).notice: Modify contact information, can only be owner of account addres

setContact(address,string).notice: Store contact information, can only be owner of account addres
